channel.title: wbstats on A minimal Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in wbstats on A minimal Hugo website

item.title: World Development Indicator data analysis
item.description: Study of World Bank’s WDI indicator Life expectancy at birth This mini-study project was an exercise to learn how to use the World Bank’s API for the World Development Indicator (WDI) repository. In this study, I explore the indicator Life expectancy at birth and I also do some comparative analisys using other indicators that I expect to be highly correlated with life expectancy: namely GDP and the status of Fragile and conflict affected situations (FCS).
